## Model Links

**text_encoders**

**diffusion_models**

**vae**
- [ae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/vae/ae.safetensors)

**Custom Character lora for consistent character**

---

nodes.title: Show Prompt for LTX for this run
widgets_values: A wide, low-angle shot reveals a dusty, stained concrete floor under the warm glow of a single exposed bulb. The worn texture of the rug anchors the center, surrounded by scuffed amplifiers and a weathered drum set partially in frame. The camera slowly tracks sideways across the rough surface, catching scattered cables and instrument cases. Soft shadows stretch outward, emphasizing the raw, grounded atmosphere of the basement rehearsal space.

nodes.title: Show Prompt for Z-image for this run
VRGDG_PromptSplitter_General - Z-image prompts
widgets_values:
{
  "prompt1": "A low, slightly unfocused shot reveals a dusty corner of a basement, where an old camcorder rests on a stack of magazines next to a tangled extension cord. Dust motes dance in the sickly yellow tint from an unseen light. The camera slowly drifts sideways, panning across the forgotten clutter against the concrete wall, as if exploring the neglected space with a quiet, intrusive gaze, enhancing the VHS-style decay and grain.",
  "prompt2": "A tight, handheld shot focuses on a tangled nest of instrument cables snaking across a grimy concrete floor, leading to an ancient, humming amplifier. A faint red recording light flickers in a reflection on its surface as dust motes dance in the harsh, murky green glow. The camera slowly pushes in, following a single cable toward the amp, heightening the sense of low anticipation and mechanical presence.",
  "prompt3": "A close-up, slightly out-of-focus shot shows a guitarist's hands, his long blonde dreads partially obscuring his face. Wearing a black hoodie, his fingers twitch with anticipation over the strings of his red electric guitar against a backdrop of worn wood paneling. The camera holds for a beat, then slowly arcs around his hands, capturing the quiet, focused energy in the dim, washed-out gray light.",
  "prompt4": "A jarring low-angle shot captures a worn sneaker slamming down onto a bass drum pedal, the motion blurred with abrupt energy. The pedal rebounds slightly as the camera holds on the foot, which remains pressed down on the rough concrete floor. Dust kicks up in the murky green glow, the shot trembling slightly from the impact to convey the sudden, raw initiation of sound.",
  "prompt5": "A wide, low-angle shot reveals a dusty, stained concrete floor under the warm glow of a single exposed bulb. The worn texture of the rug anchors the center, surrounded by scuffed amplifiers and a weathered drum set partially in frame. The camera slowly tracks sideways across the rough surface, catching scattered cables and instrument cases. Soft shadows stretch outward, emphasizing the raw, grounded atmosphere of the basement rehearsal space.",
  "prompt6": "A close-up shot frames a string of cheap Christmas lights haphazardly strung across exposed pipes. Several bulbs are burnt out while others flicker erratically, casting sickly yellow and murky green glows onto the grimy pipework. The camera holds static for a moment, then slowly tilts up, following the string of lights, capturing the uneasy energy and fragile warmth amidst the gloom.",
  "prompt7": "A shaky, handheld shot finds a woman with purple hair and sharp blue eyes, her hands trembling as she adjusts a microphone stand. Wearing a black leather jacket and jeans, she checks the mic position, her breath disturbing dust particles in the harsh light. Low ceiling beams loom above her as the camera drifts slightly closer, tightening on her face to capture her pre-performance jitters.",
  "prompt8": "A grainy, unfocused close-up shows the female singer in side profile, her eyes half-closed as she begins to sing with passion. Her black leather jacket bunches at her shoulder. The shot, initially off-center, abruptly punches in closer, a clumsy camcorder zoom that frames her mouth and jaw. The view wavers, conveying a raw, heightened sense of exposed vulnerability in the washed-out yellow light.",
  "prompt9": "A quick, tight shot captures the shaved-head drummer's hand, knuckles prominent, striking a drum rim with a stick in a blur of motion. Wearing a plain white t-shirt, his arm tenses with the impact under the harsh artificial light. The camera holds on the hand as the stick recoils, the shot shaking slightly with the percussive energy of the sharp impact.",
  "prompt10": "A handheld camera captures a low, intimate angle of four bandmates sitting cross-legged on a faded rug in a basement, laughing as they play a casual poker game. The camera gently sways and shifts focus as players toss cards into the center. Warm overhead bulbs create soft pools of light, catching smiles and glints of laughter in their eyes. Amp stacks and coiled cables fill the corners of the frame, grounding the moment in a relaxed, lived-in rehearsal space.",
  "prompt11": "A static close-up shot reveals a half-smoked cigarette slowly burning down in a dented soda can atop a worn amplifier. A tendril of smoke rises in the sickly yellow-green hue as ash clings precariously to the tip, glowing faintly. Visible VHS tracking lines flicker across the image as the camera begins a very slow push-in, tightening on the smoldering ember.",
  "prompt12": "A medium shot from slightly behind the guitarist with long blonde dreads shows him hunched over his red guitar, his face obscured by his black hoodie. He shifts uncomfortably, a subtle gesture to avoid the camera's gaze in the cluttered basement space. Bathed in murky green light with VHS tracking lines, the camera slowly tracks sideways, emphasizing his shy, reluctant presence.",
  "prompt13": "A wide, shaky shot captures the female singer with purple hair, standing among her bandmates in a black leather jacket and jeans. The cluttered basement appears smaller, more oppressive, the low ceiling hemming her in. The camera slowly pulls in on the female, distorting the space with its wide lens and enhancing the claustrophobic, resigned atmosphere under the sickly yellow-green hue and prominent visual distortion.",
  "prompt14": "A quick, disorienting, accidental zoom punches into a close-up on the female singer's face. Her chest rises and falls rapidly beneath her black leather jacket, jaw clenched and eyes wide with intense pressure. In the background, the bassist's scary mask is a blank void. The handheld camera jitters, unable to hold a steady frame, reflecting her rising anxiety in the murky green light.",
  "prompt15": "A slightly blurred close-up frames the singer's mouth, visible beneath her purple hair, as she delivers an intense vocal performance with passion. Her breath condenses in the cold, damp air, lit by a harsh light that emphasizes her strain. VHS tracking lines flicker over the sickly yellow-green image as the camera slowly pushes in, tightening on her lips to capture the escalating, urgent intensity.",
  "prompt16": "A wide, low-angle shot frames the fierce female singer with vivid purple hair leaning into the mic, her eyes locked on the camera. The drummer pounds behind her, the guitarist with blonde dreads and the bassist with blue spiky hair flanking her sides, all lost in motion. Multicolored string lights flicker across the concrete walls of the basement. The camera slowly dollies forward on a level plane, closing in on the singerâ€™s face without distortion. Harsh basement lighting and a raw, grungy atmosphere amplify the intensity of the underground performance.",
  "prompt17": "A low-angle shot looks up past the blurred, energetic form of the singer in her black leather jacket. Her head is tilted back in triumph, eyes focused upwards past the low, unfinished ceiling and exposed pipes. Murky green light and flickering bulbs illuminate her uplifted expression as VHS tracking lines crawl across the frame. The camera slowly tilts further up, emphasizing her powerful, rising energy.",
  "prompt18": "A dynamic medium close-up frames the singer, her head thrown back as she speaks with primal, unbridled passion. Wearing a black leather jacket, she is surrounded by the blurred forms of her bandmates. Harsh, flickering bare bulbs cast dramatic shadows across her face. The handheld camera shakes with the energy, slowly arcing around her to capture the raw, existential expression from multiple angles.",
  "prompt19": "A long-held, slightly shaky medium close-up focuses on the singer in her black leather jacket. Her eyes are wide open, intensely fixed on something beyond the lens, her expression one of deep sincerity and complete absorption. Under flickering bare bulbs and murky green light, VHS tracking lines pulse as she breathes. The camera remains almost static, its slight tremor enhancing the authentic connection.",
  "prompt20": "A quick, subliminal close-up captures a look of self-validation on the singer's face as her eyes momentarily close. The grimy grille of a microphone, vibrating minutely, is positioned closely to her mouth in the dimly lit basement. The murky green light from a flickering bulb catches the glint of sweat on her skin. The camera holds for a second before pulling back slightly, revealing the moment of quiet acknowledgment.",
  "prompt21": "A distorted fisheye close-up focuses on the guitarist with long blonde dreads, his red electric guitar dominating the foreground. His hands are a blur mid-strum as the other band membersâ€”the female singer, the shaved-head drummer, and the blue-haired bassistâ€”are visible in the curved background. Under the harsh glow of a bare bulb, the camera slowly orbits the guitar, exaggerating its form and capturing the raw, explosive energy.",
  "prompt22": "A handheld camera captures a mid-close shot of a girl with vibrant purple hair holding a vintage camcorder, filming her bandmates as they pose and laugh. She sits atop a worn flight case in a dimly lit concrete basement, surrounded by guitar cases and amps. The scene is filled with warm, overhead bulb lighting and floating dust particles illuminated in the beams. Her friends playfully gesture at the camera, smiles wide, as the handheld shot sways gently with natural motion, evoking a nostalgic, candid energy.",
  "prompt23": "A fish-eye shot captures the bassist wearing a scary movie mask and long black trench coat. He holds his bass as a gloved hand waves dismissively in front of the lens, partially obscuring the view of the band behind him. Lit by dramatic shadows from a distant bare bulb, the shaky camera pulls back slightly, revealing the playful, slightly annoyed atmosphere of the raw basement space.",
  "prompt24": "A low-angle medium shot shows the bandâ€”the female singer, the guitarist with dreads, the shaved-head drummer, and the blue-haired bassistâ€”sitting casually on the concrete floor, leaning against an unfinished wall. Wearing casual 90s attire, they breathe and shift subtly in the dim, diffuse glow of a single light. The camera slowly pulls in on the group, capturing the comfortable, intimate atmosphere.",
  "prompt25": "A static close-up shot focuses on a cheap digital clock on a grimy basement wall, its time blurred and unreadable due to camcorder focus issues. Muted, desaturated light from a distant bare bulb creates a timeless, disorienting atmosphere. After holding on the blurred numbers, the camera slowly drifts sideways, the flickering VHS tracking lines enhancing the sense of lost time.",
  "prompt26": "A close-up shot reveals a crumpled setlist lying on the dirty concrete floor next to a stray guitar pick. A sickly yellow light from an unseen source casts dramatic shadows across the haphazardly placed notes. The camera slowly tilts down, from the scrawled song titles to the lone pick, capturing the authentic, unpretentious, and spontaneous atmosphere of the 90s basement setting.",
  "prompt27": "A quick, jarring close-up shot focuses on a guitar amplifier's visibly worn speaker cone, which subtly vibrates with texture. Lit harshly by a single, raw bare bulb in the cluttered basement, the slight motion blur emphasizes its gritty texture. The camera pushes in rapidly, tightening on the cone as if being hit by a wave of raw, cathartic, and visceral sound.",
  "prompt28": "A slightly shaky close-up shot frames the blurred torsos of the female singer in her black leather jacket and the shaved-head drummer in his plain white t-shirt. Their shoulders are almost touching in the cramped basement space, their breathing creating subtle movement. Lit dimly to create crushed shadows, the camera drifts slowly between them, conveying a unifying, intense, and emotionally connected atmosphere.",
  "prompt29": "Handheld medium-wide shot inside a dim, concrete basement lit by a single standing light. A small band gathers on a worn rug, surrounded by amps and instruments. One musician lies on the floor playing guitar dramatically, while others laugh and point. The camera wobbles slightly, dollying in with natural motion blur, weaving slightly as it closes the distance. Soft ambient light casts subtle shadows. Posters on the walls and scattered cardboard boxes frame the gritty, lived-in atmosphere with a playful tone.",
  "prompt30": "A wide, slightly unfocused shot shows the guitarist with long blonde dreads, his head swaying animatedly as he plays his red electric guitar. Looking uninhibited in his black hoodie and jeans, he is surrounded by instruments and tangled cables. Lit by the erratic glow of Christmas lights, the camera pans slowly and unsteadily, following his liberated and confident movements.",
  "prompt31": "A handheld camera captures four bandmates lounging on mismatched couches, laughing as they watch a grainy recording of their performance on an old CRT TV. The shot sways subtly as if filmed by a friend standing nearby, framing the glowing TV and their joyful reactions. Warm lamplight spills across the room, joined by soft colorful string lights that twinkle against the concrete walls. Pizza boxes and guitar cases clutter the floor, grounding the scene in creative chaos.",
  "prompt32": "A slightly off-kilter, low-angle shot captures the female singer, her commanding posture making the confined space feel like a makeshift stage. Wearing a black leather jacket and jeans, she speaks with passion, framed by the low ceiling. Lit by a bare bulb casting harsh, yellowish light, the camera slowly arcs upward, reinforcing her creative centrality and reinforced conviction.",
  "prompt33": "A close-up captures the shaved-head drummerâ€™s arm, glistening with sweat, muscles visibly tensed as he crashes a cymbal just out of frame. The camera shakes with the impact, holding on his tensed forearm and plain white t-shirt. In the chaotic intensity of the basement practice, harsh overhead lighting casts fractured shadows, conveying an atmosphere of intense fusion and raw power.",
  "prompt34": "A harsh, unflattering close-up captures the female singer, head tilted back, softly singing. Her purple hair is messy, clinging to her sweaty face as she performs in her black leather jacket. Stark, flickering yellow-green light illuminates her desperate release. The camera pushes in slightly, trembling with the primal urgency of the moment.",
  "prompt35": "A close-up focuses on a patch of damp, unfinished concrete basement wall, with visible streaks of moisture running down it. In the murky, degraded glow from distant bare bulbs, a single drop of condensation forms and slowly traces a path downward. The camera follows this drop, conveying a sense of overwhelming power and emotional overflow in the dimly lit space.",
  "prompt36": "A tight mid shot frames the bassist with bright blue spiky hair as he aggressively strums a shimmering blue bass guitar. His bare hand moves in rapid repetition, the strings vibrating with visible intensity. His body rocks with the rhythm, sweat glinting under harsh overhead lighting. The camera stays close and slightly shifts with the motion, capturing the kinetic force and building tension in the cramped, dark basement space",
  "prompt37": "A wide shot captures all four band members mid-performance in a gritty basement. The female singer with vivid purple hair stands front and center, gripping the mic with intensity. Behind her, the drummer with a shaved head, the guitarist with blonde dreads, and the masked bassist play with synchronized fury. Harsh yellow light spills from a bare bulb overhead, casting deep shadows across the concrete walls. The camera slowly pushes in from the group to a close-up of the singerâ€™s face, steady and level, drawing the viewer into her raw, commanding presence.",
  "prompt38": "A medium shot finds the female singer in her black leather jacket, looking tired but resolute. A strand of purple hair clings to her sweaty forehead as she momentarily pauses, her chest rising and falling. In the raw basement, lit by soft, degraded light from distant bulbs, the camera slowly pushes in on her face, capturing the bittersweet acceptance and lingering exhaustion.",
  "prompt39": "A close-up on the spinning tape reel inside a Hi-8 camcorder. Faint VHS tracking lines dance across the plastic window, symbolizing the raw recording process. Bathed in a sickly yellow glow from the basement lights, the reels turn steadily. The camera holds, focusing on the intimate mechanical motion, evoking a desire for permanence and the creation of an imperfect legacy.",
  "prompt40": "A quick, almost abstract shot shows erratic, flickering Christmas lights, their warm, degraded glow burning into the murky background of the dark basement. The camera slowly drifts out of focus, transforming the inconsistent, blurred illumination into soft orbs of color that pulse and fade. This creates a sense of indelible memory and lasting emotional impact.",
  "prompt41": "A low-angle shot shows the female singer speaking with passion, her body leaning toward a bass amp as its speaker subtly vibrates with deep sound waves. In the gritty basement, concrete walls are lost in murky green shadows. Lit by harsh, low-key artificial light, the camera tracks sideways, gliding past her and the amp, capturing her grounded power and visceral connection to the sound.",
  "prompt42": "A slightly blurred close-up shows the female singer's worn hands holding drumsticks, resting momentarily on a snare drum. Her expression, just visible, conveys quiet gratitude for the instrument. In the dimly lit basement, localized, harsh artificial light highlights the texture of the drum skin. The camera slowly pulls back, revealing her sitting at the kit in a moment of heartfelt appreciation.",
  "prompt43": "A quick, intimate close-up shot briefly captures the female singer as she looks up, meeting the cameraâ€™s gaze with a flicker of acknowledgment. Her expression is full of unspoken gratitude for the present moment. In the hazy basement, low-key light creates a slight glint in her eyes. The camera holds for a beat before she looks away, the intimate, appreciative moment passing quickly.",
  "prompt44": "A close-up shot focuses on the female singer's chest, rising and falling gently with her breath under her black leather jacket. This subtle movement symbolizes an internal beat that has become one with the music. In the obscured, raw basement setting, intimate, low-key light emphasizes the vital rhythm. The camera holds steady, capturing the deep, quiet connection to the performance.",
  "prompt45": "A rapid, jarring close-up shot shows the female singer's drumsticks striking a drum in a blur of motion, evoking the frantic energy of a panicked heartbeat. In the chaotic basement drum kit setup, dynamic, flickering harsh light emphasizes the motion blur and the impact. The shaky camera tries to follow the frantic movement, conveying an urgent and desperate atmosphere.",
  "prompt46": "A complex, slightly distorted shot shows the female singer speaking with passion. She stands in a basement where the concrete floor recedes into murky green shadow, and light bends around the glinting strings of the red guitar nearby. This creates a sense of sensory alteration. The camera slowly orbits her, the dynamic light casting long, moving shadows, creating an abstract and foundational mood.",
  "prompt47": "A wide, low-angle shot captures the female singer standing alone in an extremely cramped basement, her defiant posture emphasizing her rejection of needing more space. Speaking with passion, she commands the frame under a low ceiling. Lit by a raw, bare bulb casting deep shadows, the camera slowly pushes in, highlighting her resolute expression and self-sufficient creative power.",
  "prompt48": "A medium shot frames the female singer, her expression authentic and informal. A camerapersonâ€™s hand briefly enters the lower corner of the frame, slightly out of focus, making a casual gesture toward her. In the raw basement, lit by practical light, she subtly reacts with a small smile. The camera holds, capturing this intimate and caring, almost unnoticed interaction.",
  "prompt49": "A medium close-up shows the female singer, tired but resolute in her black leather jacket. She nods almost imperceptibly while speaking with passion, then turns back to the microphone, confirming her decision to continue despite fatigue. Lit by a harsh bare bulb, the camera follows her turn, keeping her determined face in sharp focus as stark shadows play across it.",
  "prompt50": "A lingering medium close-up focuses on the female singer's hands as they slowly lift from the fretboard of a red guitar. Wearing a black leather jacket, she lets a final note fade in the dimming basement light. The camera holds steady on her hands, then begins a slow drift out of focus, signaling the decline of intense energy into a quiet, melancholic atmosphere.",
  "prompt51": "A sharply downward-angled shot captures a chaotic, blurry expanse of concrete floor and stray cables, the image captured mid-motion as if the camera has just been dropped. In the dimly lit basement, the sudden, jarring tilt and motion blur convey a sense of physical shock and disorientation. The camera comes to a rest, the view askew and partially obscured.",
  "prompt52": "A static, low-angle shot reveals a dark and indistinct basement floor with a few speaker cables barely visible in the dimness. In the faint, almost imperceptible ambient light, dust settles undisturbed. The camera holds completely still, the silence and stillness emphasizing the neglect and quiet aftermath, evoking a lingering presence and a memory that outlasts direct perception.",
  "prompt53": "A handheld camera follows behind four musicians as they ascend creaky wooden stairs from a dim basement rehearsal room. Each carries gearâ€”guitar cases, amps, drum bagsâ€”casting long shadows on the concrete walls. The camera bobs gently with each step, capturing the slow transition from the warm, yellow basement light to the cooler exterior glow filtering through the open door. Posters peel on the walls behind them, and stray cables snake across the floor, hinting at the session theyâ€™re leaving behind.",
  "prompt54": "A full-frame view of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. Faint, unstable patches of dim greenish-yellow light barely surface and fade across the frame, as if the scene has abruptly lost its energy. The camera is static, capturing only the residual ambient glow against deep shadow, creating an atmosphere of sudden cessation and unresolved suspension.",
  "prompt55": "A wide shot of an almost entirely black frame, where a single, faint flicker of light from a Christmas bulb briefly appears and vanishes. It dimly illuminates a hint of the dark basement for an instant before returning to black. The camera holds static, the brief flash acting as a residual echo, evoking nostalgia and the quiet realization that some moments defy capture.",
  "prompt56": "A full-frame shot of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. The faintest residual texture and VHS grain are barely perceptible before dissolving completely into pure shadow. Lit by an almost nonexistent ambient glow, the static camera captures a gradual departure, a quiet ending, and a lingering presence fading into silence.",
  "prompt57": "A full-frame shot of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. The faintest residual texture and VHS grain are barely perceptible before dissolving completely into pure shadow. Lit by an almost nonexistent ambient glow, the static camera captures a gradual departure, a quiet ending, and a lingering presence fading into silence."
}

nodes.title: Json Prompts
widgets_values:
# Prompt List Z-imageâž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸

This section contains your JSON prompt list for Z-image

- Each prompt is separated and processed individually per run.
- These prompts are used to generate:
  - **Text-to-image prompts**

A dark cinematic horror photograph of a decaying humanoid figure trapped behind a rusted metal door in an abandoned asylum. The camera is zoomed out to reveal a dim, narrow hallway lit by flickering overhead lights. The creature's infected, bony arm reaches desperately through a small square hole in the center of the door. Its face is still visible behind the opening, pale and diseased, with haunting blue eyes and cracked, weeping skin. The metal around the hole is stained and corroded. The hallway is lined with peeling paint, grime, and broken tiles. Shot from eye level to capture the tension between the outstretched hand and the eerie corridor beyond. Cold, desaturated tones with a cinematic matte finish.
change this to finalmix if you are using the final mix audio input
change this to finalmix if you are using the final mix audio input

nodes.title: Json Prompts
widgets_values:
# Prompt List LTXâž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸âž¡ï¸

This section contains your JSON prompt list for the image to video propmts.

- Each prompt is separated and processed individually per run.
- These prompts are used to generate:
  - **Image-to-video prompts**

nodes.title: SRT file
widgets_values:
# SRT file for beat batched scenes

If your using the new prompt creator that creates the SRT file for beat matches scenes you must enter the path to the file in here so it can be used. If you want to use normal duration mode just set the duration settings to your choice and do not enter anything here.

nodes.title: Remake mode
widgets_values:
# Move bad clips to remake folder

At the end of the run, you can move clips you don't like to the remake folder. Then turn on "use remake folder" and hit run. It will remake the clips for you. If you do this more than once make sure to delete any temp files from the folder first.

widgets_values:
{
  "prompt1": "A low, slightly unfocused shot reveals a dusty corner of a basement, where an old camcorder rests on a stack of magazines next to a tangled extension cord. Dust motes dance in the sickly yellow tint from an unseen light. The camera slowly drifts sideways, panning across the forgotten clutter against the concrete wall, as if exploring the neglected space with a quiet, intrusive gaze, enhancing the VHS-style decay and grain.",
  "prompt2": "A tight, handheld shot focuses on a tangled nest of instrument cables snaking across a grimy concrete floor, leading to an ancient, humming amplifier. A faint red recording light flickers in a reflection on its surface as dust motes dance in the harsh, murky green glow. The camera slowly pushes in, following a single cable toward the amp, heightening the sense of low anticipation and mechanical presence.",
  "prompt3": "A close-up, slightly out-of-focus shot shows a guitarist's hands, his long blonde dreads partially obscuring his face. Wearing a black hoodie, his fingers twitch with anticipation over the strings of his red electric guitar against a backdrop of worn wood paneling. The camera holds for a beat, then slowly arcs around his hands, capturing the quiet, focused energy in the dim, washed-out gray light.",
  "prompt4": "A jarring low-angle shot captures a worn sneaker slamming down onto a bass drum pedal, the motion blurred with abrupt energy. The pedal rebounds slightly as the camera holds on the foot, which remains pressed down on the rough concrete floor. Dust kicks up in the murky green glow, the shot trembling slightly from the impact to convey the sudden, raw initiation of sound.",
  "prompt5": "A wide, low-angle shot reveals a dusty, stained concrete floor under the warm glow of a single exposed bulb. The worn texture of the rug anchors the center, surrounded by scuffed amplifiers and a weathered drum set partially in frame. The camera slowly tracks sideways across the rough surface, catching scattered cables and instrument cases. Soft shadows stretch outward, emphasizing the raw, grounded atmosphere of the basement rehearsal space.",
  "prompt6": "A close-up shot frames a string of cheap Christmas lights haphazardly strung across exposed pipes. Several bulbs are burnt out while others flicker erratically, casting sickly yellow and murky green glows onto the grimy pipework. The camera holds static for a moment, then slowly tilts up, following the string of lights, capturing the uneasy energy and fragile warmth amidst the gloom.",
  "prompt7": "A shaky, handheld shot finds a woman with purple hair and sharp blue eyes, her hands trembling as she adjusts a microphone stand. Wearing a black leather jacket and jeans, she checks the mic position, her breath disturbing dust particles in the harsh light. Low ceiling beams loom above her as the camera drifts slightly closer, tightening on her face to capture her pre-performance jitters.",
  "prompt8": "A grainy, unfocused close-up shows the female singer in side profile, her eyes half-closed as she begins to sing with passion. Her black leather jacket bunches at her shoulder. The shot, initially off-center, abruptly punches in closer, a clumsy camcorder zoom that frames her mouth and jaw. The view wavers, conveying a raw, heightened sense of exposed vulnerability in the washed-out yellow light.",
  "prompt9": "A quick, tight shot captures the shaved-head drummer's hand, knuckles prominent, striking a drum rim with a stick in a blur of motion. Wearing a plain white t-shirt, his arm tenses with the impact under the harsh artificial light. The camera holds on the hand as the stick recoils, the shot shaking slightly with the percussive energy of the sharp impact.",
  "prompt10": "A handheld camera captures a low, intimate angle of four bandmates sitting cross-legged on a faded rug in a basement, laughing as they play a casual poker game. The camera gently sways and shifts focus as players toss cards into the center. Warm overhead bulbs create soft pools of light, catching smiles and glints of laughter in their eyes. Amp stacks and coiled cables fill the corners of the frame, grounding the moment in a relaxed, lived-in rehearsal space.",
  "prompt11": "A static close-up shot reveals a half-smoked cigarette slowly burning down in a dented soda can atop a worn amplifier. A tendril of smoke rises in the sickly yellow-green hue as ash clings precariously to the tip, glowing faintly. Visible VHS tracking lines flicker across the image as the camera begins a very slow push-in, tightening on the smoldering ember.",
  "prompt12": "A medium shot from slightly behind the guitarist with long blonde dreads shows him hunched over his red guitar, his face obscured by his black hoodie. He shifts uncomfortably, a subtle gesture to avoid the camera's gaze in the cluttered basement space. Bathed in murky green light with VHS tracking lines, the camera slowly tracks sideways, emphasizing his shy, reluctant presence.",
  "prompt13": "A wide, shaky shot captures the female singer with purple hair, standing among her bandmates in a black leather jacket and jeans. The cluttered basement appears smaller, more oppressive, the low ceiling hemming her in. The camera slowly pulls in on the female, distorting the space with its wide lens and enhancing the claustrophobic, resigned atmosphere under the sickly yellow-green hue and prominent visual distortion.",
  "prompt14": "A quick, disorienting, accidental zoom punches into a close-up on the female singer's face. Her chest rises and falls rapidly beneath her black leather jacket, jaw clenched and eyes wide with intense pressure. In the background, the bassist's scary mask is a blank void. The handheld camera jitters, unable to hold a steady frame, reflecting her rising anxiety in the murky green light.",
  "prompt15": "A slightly blurred close-up frames the singer's mouth, visible beneath her purple hair, as she delivers an intense vocal performance with passion. Her breath condenses in the cold, damp air, lit by a harsh light that emphasizes her strain. VHS tracking lines flicker over the sickly yellow-green image as the camera slowly pushes in, tightening on her lips to capture the escalating, urgent intensity.",
  "prompt16": "A wide, low-angle shot frames the fierce female singer with vivid purple hair leaning into the mic, her eyes locked on the camera. The drummer pounds behind her, the guitarist with blonde dreads and the bassist with blue spiky hair flanking her sides, all lost in motion. Multicolored string lights flicker across the concrete walls of the basement. The camera slowly dollies forward on a level plane, closing in on the singerâ€™s face without distortion. Harsh basement lighting and a raw, grungy atmosphere amplify the intensity of the underground performance.",
  "prompt17": "A low-angle shot looks up past the blurred, energetic form of the singer in her black leather jacket. Her head is tilted back in triumph, eyes focused upwards past the low, unfinished ceiling and exposed pipes. Murky green light and flickering bulbs illuminate her uplifted expression as VHS tracking lines crawl across the frame. The camera slowly tilts further up, emphasizing her powerful, rising energy.",
  "prompt18": "A dynamic medium close-up frames the singer, her head thrown back as she speaks with primal, unbridled passion. Wearing a black leather jacket, she is surrounded by the blurred forms of her bandmates. Harsh, flickering bare bulbs cast dramatic shadows across her face. The handheld camera shakes with the energy, slowly arcing around her to capture the raw, existential expression from multiple angles.",
  "prompt19": "A long-held, slightly shaky medium close-up focuses on the singer in her black leather jacket. Her eyes are wide open, intensely fixed on something beyond the lens, her expression one of deep sincerity and complete absorption. Under flickering bare bulbs and murky green light, VHS tracking lines pulse as she breathes. The camera remains almost static, its slight tremor enhancing the authentic connection.",
  "prompt20": "A quick, subliminal close-up captures a look of self-validation on the singer's face as her eyes momentarily close. The grimy grille of a microphone, vibrating minutely, is positioned closely to her mouth in the dimly lit basement. The murky green light from a flickering bulb catches the glint of sweat on her skin. The camera holds for a second before pulling back slightly, revealing the moment of quiet acknowledgment.",
  "prompt21": "A distorted fisheye close-up focuses on the guitarist with long blonde dreads, his red electric guitar dominating the foreground. His hands are a blur mid-strum as the other band membersâ€”the female singer, the shaved-head drummer, and the blue-haired bassistâ€”are visible in the curved background. Under the harsh glow of a bare bulb, the camera slowly orbits the guitar, exaggerating its form and capturing the raw, explosive energy.",
  "prompt22": "A handheld camera captures a mid-close shot of a girl with vibrant purple hair holding a vintage camcorder, filming her bandmates as they pose and laugh. She sits atop a worn flight case in a dimly lit concrete basement, surrounded by guitar cases and amps. The scene is filled with warm, overhead bulb lighting and floating dust particles illuminated in the beams. Her friends playfully gesture at the camera, smiles wide, as the handheld shot sways gently with natural motion, evoking a nostalgic, candid energy.",
  "prompt23": "A fish-eye shot captures the bassist wearing a scary movie mask and long black trench coat. He holds his bass as a gloved hand waves dismissively in front of the lens, partially obscuring the view of the band behind him. Lit by dramatic shadows from a distant bare bulb, the shaky camera pulls back slightly, revealing the playful, slightly annoyed atmosphere of the raw basement space.",
  "prompt24": "A low-angle medium shot shows the bandâ€”the female singer, the guitarist with dreads, the shaved-head drummer, and the blue-haired bassistâ€”sitting casually on the concrete floor, leaning against an unfinished wall. Wearing casual 90s attire, they breathe and shift subtly in the dim, diffuse glow of a single light. The camera slowly pulls in on the group, capturing the comfortable, intimate atmosphere.",
  "prompt25": "A static close-up shot focuses on a cheap digital clock on a grimy basement wall, its time blurred and unreadable due to camcorder focus issues. Muted, desaturated light from a distant bare bulb creates a timeless, disorienting atmosphere. After holding on the blurred numbers, the camera slowly drifts sideways, the flickering VHS tracking lines enhancing the sense of lost time.",
  "prompt26": "A close-up shot reveals a crumpled setlist lying on the dirty concrete floor next to a stray guitar pick. A sickly yellow light from an unseen source casts dramatic shadows across the haphazardly placed notes. The camera slowly tilts down, from the scrawled song titles to the lone pick, capturing the authentic, unpretentious, and spontaneous atmosphere of the 90s basement setting.",
  "prompt27": "A quick, jarring close-up shot focuses on a guitar amplifier's visibly worn speaker cone, which subtly vibrates with texture. Lit harshly by a single, raw bare bulb in the cluttered basement, the slight motion blur emphasizes its gritty texture. The camera pushes in rapidly, tightening on the cone as if being hit by a wave of raw, cathartic, and visceral sound.",
  "prompt28": "A slightly shaky close-up shot frames the blurred torsos of the female singer in her black leather jacket and the shaved-head drummer in his plain white t-shirt. Their shoulders are almost touching in the cramped basement space, their breathing creating subtle movement. Lit dimly to create crushed shadows, the camera drifts slowly between them, conveying a unifying, intense, and emotionally connected atmosphere.",
  "prompt29": "Handheld medium-wide shot inside a dim, concrete basement lit by a single standing light. A small band gathers on a worn rug, surrounded by amps and instruments. One musician lies on the floor playing guitar dramatically, while others laugh and point. The camera wobbles slightly, dollying in with natural motion blur, weaving slightly as it closes the distance. Soft ambient light casts subtle shadows. Posters on the walls and scattered cardboard boxes frame the gritty, lived-in atmosphere with a playful tone.",
  "prompt30": "A wide, slightly unfocused shot shows the guitarist with long blonde dreads, his head swaying animatedly as he plays his red electric guitar. Looking uninhibited in his black hoodie and jeans, he is surrounded by instruments and tangled cables. Lit by the erratic glow of Christmas lights, the camera pans slowly and unsteadily, following his liberated and confident movements.",
  "prompt31": "A handheld camera captures four bandmates lounging on mismatched couches, laughing as they watch a grainy recording of their performance on an old CRT TV. The shot sways subtly as if filmed by a friend standing nearby, framing the glowing TV and their joyful reactions. Warm lamplight spills across the room, joined by soft colorful string lights that twinkle against the concrete walls. Pizza boxes and guitar cases clutter the floor, grounding the scene in creative chaos.",
  "prompt32": "A slightly off-kilter, low-angle shot captures the female singer, her commanding posture making the confined space feel like a makeshift stage. Wearing a black leather jacket and jeans, she speaks with passion, framed by the low ceiling. Lit by a bare bulb casting harsh, yellowish light, the camera slowly arcs upward, reinforcing her creative centrality and reinforced conviction.",
  "prompt33": "A close-up captures the shaved-head drummerâ€™s arm, glistening with sweat, muscles visibly tensed as he crashes a cymbal just out of frame. The camera shakes with the impact, holding on his tensed forearm and plain white t-shirt. In the chaotic intensity of the basement practice, harsh overhead lighting casts fractured shadows, conveying an atmosphere of intense fusion and raw power.",
  "prompt34": "A harsh, unflattering close-up captures the female singer, head tilted back, softly singing. Her purple hair is messy, clinging to her sweaty face as she performs in her black leather jacket. Stark, flickering yellow-green light illuminates her desperate release. The camera pushes in slightly, trembling with the primal urgency of the moment.",
  "prompt35": "A close-up focuses on a patch of damp, unfinished concrete basement wall, with visible streaks of moisture running down it. In the murky, degraded glow from distant bare bulbs, a single drop of condensation forms and slowly traces a path downward. The camera follows this drop, conveying a sense of overwhelming power and emotional overflow in the dimly lit space.",
  "prompt36": "A tight mid shot frames the bassist with bright blue spiky hair as he aggressively strums a shimmering blue bass guitar. His bare hand moves in rapid repetition, the strings vibrating with visible intensity. His body rocks with the rhythm, sweat glinting under harsh overhead lighting. The camera stays close and slightly shifts with the motion, capturing the kinetic force and building tension in the cramped, dark basement space",
  "prompt37": "A wide shot captures all four band members mid-performance in a gritty basement. The female singer with vivid purple hair stands front and center, gripping the mic with intensity. Behind her, the drummer with a shaved head, the guitarist with blonde dreads, and the masked bassist play with synchronized fury. Harsh yellow light spills from a bare bulb overhead, casting deep shadows across the concrete walls. The camera slowly pushes in from the group to a close-up of the singerâ€™s face, steady and level, drawing the viewer into her raw, commanding presence.",
  "prompt38": "A medium shot finds the female singer in her black leather jacket, looking tired but resolute. A strand of purple hair clings to her sweaty forehead as she momentarily pauses, her chest rising and falling. In the raw basement, lit by soft, degraded light from distant bulbs, the camera slowly pushes in on her face, capturing the bittersweet acceptance and lingering exhaustion.",
  "prompt39": "A close-up on the spinning tape reel inside a Hi-8 camcorder. Faint VHS tracking lines dance across the plastic window, symbolizing the raw recording process. Bathed in a sickly yellow glow from the basement lights, the reels turn steadily. The camera holds, focusing on the intimate mechanical motion, evoking a desire for permanence and the creation of an imperfect legacy.",
  "prompt40": "A quick, almost abstract shot shows erratic, flickering Christmas lights, their warm, degraded glow burning into the murky background of the dark basement. The camera slowly drifts out of focus, transforming the inconsistent, blurred illumination into soft orbs of color that pulse and fade. This creates a sense of indelible memory and lasting emotional impact.",
  "prompt41": "A low-angle shot shows the female singer speaking with passion, her body leaning toward a bass amp as its speaker subtly vibrates with deep sound waves. In the gritty basement, concrete walls are lost in murky green shadows. Lit by harsh, low-key artificial light, the camera tracks sideways, gliding past her and the amp, capturing her grounded power and visceral connection to the sound.",
  "prompt42": "A slightly blurred close-up shows the female singer's worn hands holding drumsticks, resting momentarily on a snare drum. Her expression, just visible, conveys quiet gratitude for the instrument. In the dimly lit basement, localized, harsh artificial light highlights the texture of the drum skin. The camera slowly pulls back, revealing her sitting at the kit in a moment of heartfelt appreciation.",
  "prompt43": "A quick, intimate close-up shot briefly captures the female singer as she looks up, meeting the cameraâ€™s gaze with a flicker of acknowledgment. Her expression is full of unspoken gratitude for the present moment. In the hazy basement, low-key light creates a slight glint in her eyes. The camera holds for a beat before she looks away, the intimate, appreciative moment passing quickly.",
  "prompt44": "A close-up shot focuses on the female singer's chest, rising and falling gently with her breath under her black leather jacket. This subtle movement symbolizes an internal beat that has become one with the music. In the obscured, raw basement setting, intimate, low-key light emphasizes the vital rhythm. The camera holds steady, capturing the deep, quiet connection to the performance.",
  "prompt45": "A rapid, jarring close-up shot shows the female singer's drumsticks striking a drum in a blur of motion, evoking the frantic energy of a panicked heartbeat. In the chaotic basement drum kit setup, dynamic, flickering harsh light emphasizes the motion blur and the impact. The shaky camera tries to follow the frantic movement, conveying an urgent and desperate atmosphere.",
  "prompt46": "A complex, slightly distorted shot shows the female singer speaking with passion. She stands in a basement where the concrete floor recedes into murky green shadow, and light bends around the glinting strings of the red guitar nearby. This creates a sense of sensory alteration. The camera slowly orbits her, the dynamic light casting long, moving shadows, creating an abstract and foundational mood.",
  "prompt47": "A wide, low-angle shot captures the female singer standing alone in an extremely cramped basement, her defiant posture emphasizing her rejection of needing more space. Speaking with passion, she commands the frame under a low ceiling. Lit by a raw, bare bulb casting deep shadows, the camera slowly pushes in, highlighting her resolute expression and self-sufficient creative power.",
  "prompt48": "A medium shot frames the female singer, her expression authentic and informal. A camerapersonâ€™s hand briefly enters the lower corner of the frame, slightly out of focus, making a casual gesture toward her. In the raw basement, lit by practical light, she subtly reacts with a small smile. The camera holds, capturing this intimate and caring, almost unnoticed interaction.",
  "prompt49": "A medium close-up shows the female singer, tired but resolute in her black leather jacket. She nods almost imperceptibly while speaking with passion, then turns back to the microphone, confirming her decision to continue despite fatigue. Lit by a harsh bare bulb, the camera follows her turn, keeping her determined face in sharp focus as stark shadows play across it.",
  "prompt50": "A lingering medium close-up focuses on the female singer's hands as they slowly lift from the fretboard of a red guitar. Wearing a black leather jacket, she lets a final note fade in the dimming basement light. The camera holds steady on her hands, then begins a slow drift out of focus, signaling the decline of intense energy into a quiet, melancholic atmosphere.",
  "prompt51": "A sharply downward-angled shot captures a chaotic, blurry expanse of concrete floor and stray cables, the image captured mid-motion as if the camera has just been dropped. In the dimly lit basement, the sudden, jarring tilt and motion blur convey a sense of physical shock and disorientation. The camera comes to a rest, the view askew and partially obscured.",
  "prompt52": "A static, low-angle shot reveals a dark and indistinct basement floor with a few speaker cables barely visible in the dimness. In the faint, almost imperceptible ambient light, dust settles undisturbed. The camera holds completely still, the silence and stillness emphasizing the neglect and quiet aftermath, evoking a lingering presence and a memory that outlasts direct perception.",
  "prompt53": "A handheld camera follows behind four musicians as they ascend creaky wooden stairs from a dim basement rehearsal room. Each carries gearâ€”guitar cases, amps, drum bagsâ€”casting long shadows on the concrete walls. The camera bobs gently with each step, capturing the slow transition from the warm, yellow basement light to the cooler exterior glow filtering through the open door. Posters peel on the walls behind them, and stray cables snake across the floor, hinting at the session theyâ€™re leaving behind.",
  "prompt54": "A full-frame view of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. Faint, unstable patches of dim greenish-yellow light barely surface and fade across the frame, as if the scene has abruptly lost its energy. The camera is static, capturing only the residual ambient glow against deep shadow, creating an atmosphere of sudden cessation and unresolved suspension.",
  "prompt55": "A wide shot of an almost entirely black frame, where a single, faint flicker of light from a Christmas bulb briefly appears and vanishes. It dimly illuminates a hint of the dark basement for an instant before returning to black. The camera holds static, the brief flash acting as a residual echo, evoking nostalgia and the quiet realization that some moments defy capture.",
  "prompt56": "A full-frame shot of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. The faintest residual texture and VHS grain are barely perceptible before dissolving completely into pure shadow. Lit by an almost nonexistent ambient glow, the static camera captures a gradual departure, a quiet ending, and a lingering presence fading into silence.",
  "prompt57": "A full-frame shot of near-total darkness, the image almost entirely black. The faintest residual texture and VHS grain are barely perceptible before dissolving completely into pure shadow. Lit by an almost nonexistent ambient glow, the static camera captures a gradual departure, a quiet ending, and a lingering presence fading into silence."
}

nodes.title: melband reoformer
widgets_values: If you want to seperate your vocals which is not needed you can you these.

A dark cinematic horror photograph of a decaying humanoid figure trapped behind a rusted metal door in an abandoned asylum. The camera is zoomed out to reveal a dim, narrow hallway lit by flickering overhead lights. The creature's infected, bony arm reaches desperately through a small square hole in the center of the door. Its face is still visible behind the opening, pale and diseased, with haunting blue eyes and cracked, weeping skin. The metal around the hole is stained and corroded. The hallway is lined with peeling paint, grime, and broken tiles. Shot from eye level to capture the tension between the outstretched hand and the eerie corridor beyond. Cold, desaturated tones with a cinematic matte finish.

inputs.text: A medium close-up shot features a Caucasian man with a closely shaven head and face, wearing a black baseball cap with "PNTR" in white letters on the front, and a dark grey t-shirt with "JUST DO IT" visible across his chest. A small black microphone is clipped to his shirt collar. He is positioned slightly to the left of the frame, looking intently downwards and to his right, his eyes focused off-camera. His facial expression is one of deep concentration, with his brow slightly furrowed. As he looks down, a quick sniff sound is heard, and then he speaks with a deep male voice and a slightly frustrated tone, saying, "I think it's so bad." The camera remains static throughout, maintaining a shallow depth of field, which keeps the man in sharp focus while the background is softly blurred, revealing a light-colored wall with white wooden shelving or trim, and a partially open white wooden door on the right. After a brief pause, another short, audible sniff is heard. The man then continues to speak, his voice maintaining the same quality, as he states, "So bad. So bad." He elaborates further, emphasizing his point with a final statement, "This got to be, it's got to be the worst tool I've ever seen."
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles
